sentence.Network_en: the heliocentric model of the solar system

sentence.Network_en: He also propounded the Heliocentric theory of gravitation, thus predating Copernicus by almost one thousand years.
sentence.Network_cn: 他也提出以引力作用为基础的日心说, 比哥白尼早了几乎一千年.
